name: Jump Smash!
description:
Touch to jump up to the ball & smash it! While it might sound simple, Jump Smash! is a test of speed, focus and control.

Easy to learn but hard to master, it's also crazy fun...and a bit addictive.

Game Features:

- Have Endless Wall Smashing fun in Endless Mode!
- Fight Evil Bosses in Daily Challenge Mode!
- Challenge a Mate in 2 Player Mode!
- Perform Spectacular Smash Combos!
- Complete Challenges & Unlock 24 Handcrafted Characters!
- Unlock Custom Rackets and Balls!
- Compete in Global High Score Rankings!
